content: In 1950, the science fiction author A.E. Van Vogt defined a nexialist as “one skilled in the science of joining together in an orderly fashion the knowledge of one field of learning with that of other fields”. In his science fiction novel, “The Voyage of the Space Beagle”, Van Vogt created a protagonist, Dr. Elliott Grosvenor, who was the first graduate of “the Nexial Foundation.” Trained in integrated science and thought, Grosvenor was able to see the connection between many aspects of a problem that other specialists could not see because of their narrow training. Please, someone tell the Nexial Foundation to give an Honorary degree to Elon!
